M14=0005
M15=0010
I14=0010
I4=0000
M7=0001
R5=0002
R6=0003
R7=0001
CALL(M14,I14)
CALL(M14,I14)
CALL(M15,I14)
IDLE
NOP
FINISH

.CALL(0015)
R5=R5+R6
RTS

.CALL(0020)
R5=R5-R7
DM(I4,M7)=R5
IF NE JUMP(M15,I14)
RTS

.MEMCHECK
0000 0007
0001 0006
0002 0005
0003 0004
0004 0003
0005 0002
0006 0001
0007 0000
